game.name: Astro Protocol
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Adjustable Difficulty, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Stats, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A tactical and challenging turn-based 4X strategy game. Explore the galaxy, build space stations, research powerful technologies, colonize new worlds and command deadly fleets to lead your empire to victory.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A tactical and challenging turn-based 4X strategy game. Explore the galaxy, build space stations, research powerful technologies, colonize new worlds and command deadly fleets to lead your empire to victory.
